comments.comment: Adjust pH to 6.5 with 10 N KOH and add the following medium.
Heat the above mixed solution at 60℃ for 5 to 10 min and then bubble with N2 gas. And then add the following ingredients.
Under anaerobic condition, the medium is autoclaved at 100℃ for 10 min.

Nitrilotriacetic acid is suspended in 500 ml water, and dissolved by titrating with 2 N KOH until its pH stabilize at 6.5. The rest of the ingredients are added and dissolved. Finally total volume is adjusted to 1 L.
****3% Cellulose suspension which is ball-milled for 3 days.
